product_name: CamelBak Gambler Hydration Snow Pack - Men's
long_description: With a low-profile design, 3-liter reservoir and pockets for your skins and probe, the Gambler hydration pack helps you play in the powder longer without slowing you down on steep turns and climbs.
short_description: With a low-profile design, 3-liter reservoir and pockets for your skins and probe, the Gambler hydration pack helps you play in the powder longer without slowing you down on steep turns and climbs.
